trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT]Before you work with Azure resources, it's important to understand that Azure currently has two deployment models: Resource Manager, and classic.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT]Before you work with Azure resources, it's important to understand that Azure currently has two deployment models: Resource Manager, and classic.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you understand [deployment models and tools](azure-classic-rm.md) before working with any Azure resource.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you understand [deployment models and tools](azure-classic-rm.md) before working with any Azure resource.

trans-unit.source: You can view the documentation for different tools by clicking the tabs at the top of this article.
trans-unit.target: You can view the documentation for different tools by clicking the tabs at the top of this article.
